billow.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if something made of cloth billows, it moves in the wind
billow.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her long skirt billowed in the breeze.
billow.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a cloud or smoke billows, it rises in a round mass
billow.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: There was smoke billowing out of the windows.
billow.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a moving cloud or mass of something such as smoke or cloth
billow.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a wave, especially a very large one
